title: 'Best buy for working professionals and gamers'
body: I love my Nilkamal Fyrebird gaming chair! It's so comfortable and supportive, especially for long gaming sessions. The back support is amazing, and the arm rests are easy to adjust to my preferred height and angle. The chair looks great too, with a sleek design and quality materials. I would highly recommend this chair to anyone looking for a gaming chair that offers both comfort and style.  Its is good for working professionals as well as I am a software engineer who works around 12-14 hrs daily and needed this kind of chair

title: 'Cheap imported item with very cheap quality of fabric'
body: 'Very cheap quality material is used. Not expected from an established brand like Neelkamal to sell cheap imported items. Better to go for Greensoul or Circle gaming chair.'

title: 'Value for money'
body: 'I bought this a month ago and the chair is comfortable it is really helpful for the back. The only thing needs improvement is two openings near center so air can pass and avoid sweating of back.'

title: 'Super comfortable ...'
body: 'I have to usually work long hours and my previous chair was causing me pain in my neck and back. With Nilkamal the ergonomics were well-designed and I am not feeling any pain. Definitely buy for whoever is looking for a good office chair.'

title: 'Purchase of the Nilkamal Fyrebird Athena Gaming Chair!'
body: 'The ergonomic lumbar support and adjustable neck pillow offer personalized support for your back and neck which can help reduce tension and improve your posture during long gaming sessions. The 2D hand rests are also adjustable and slide to help move your hands with ease providing an added level of comfort.  The 165° butterfly mechanism allows you to recline and relax while the 360° swivel feature allows for easy manoeuvrability. The gas-lift adjustment feature raises and lowers the chair to your preferred height making it easy to customize for your specific needs.  The ergonomic bucket seat design of this chair helps keep you comfortably seated while the sturdy nylon base supports your spine for higher relaxation. The chair also comes equipped with smooth nylon castors making it easy to glide across the room while seated.  Finally the virgin moulded foam cushions provide a comfortable and supportive seat for extended hours of gaming.  Overall the Nilkamal Fyrebird Athena Gaming Chair is a great choice for anyone looking for a comfortable supportive gaming chair. I highly recommend this product to anyone in the market for a new gaming chair.'
